name: Cardseer
summary: Cardseer is a fantasy deckbuilding game combining old school RPGs like the original Final Fantasy's with card games Yugioh, Hearthstone and Gwent. features a story based campaign, taking you across the continent to stop a mysterious evil force, and a challenging roguelike Gauntlet mode. Engage in fast paced card combat against a horde of villains, carefully traverse the hazardous map and strategically collect game-changing artifacts to emerge victorious!
